source: You came across a caravan, a rare thing in these desolate lands.
As you traveled through the Badlands towards Coparann, Kythaela asked you to stop near an old ruin…
Kythaela stopped again, and asked to enter what seems to be an old Imperial prison.
You must have roamed close to a nest: a handful of these little monsters wants you dead.
Robbers in search of easy prey - preferably wealthy.
Your party is forced to stop for an unplanned short rest. Something is wrong.
You've wandered too close to a nest! The eagles will fight to the death to protect their young!
A bevy of flying snakes who want you away from their eggs.
A goblin shaman and his followers in search of glory.
Goblins on the hunt with their tame wolves.
A band of goblin skirmishers looking for trouble.
An orc chieftain leading a band of warriors in search of scars and glory.
A terrible winter wolf, on the hunt with a few normal wolves.
A pack of ravenous wolves, desperate for a kill.
A huge party of deep spiders looking to feed their spiderlings.
Roaming skeletons, escaped from some desecrated tomb.
A couple of acolytes led by a charismatic leader.
A student of magic with a bunch of his rotting creations.
A couple of spies trying to escape enemy intelligence… at all costs.
A veteran soldier roaming the roads in search for death on the battlefield.
Like-minded fighters in search for blood. Preferably yours.
A lonely wanderer of the Badlands who's been corrupted by chaotic magic.
A small pack of wolves, famished and weakened.
A small group of goblins with their pet wolf.
A wandering ogre, probably lost and definitely looking for something - or someone - to eat.
A small bunch of orcs, looking for something to kill.
A group of undeads, wandering around and looking to end a few lives.
A cleric and his goons, roaming the land to spread their evil cult.
A band of ghouls with wicked hunger.
A couple of giant eagles that seem threatened by your presence.
A group of goblins led by a beastmaster and his dire wolf.
A rare creature on Solasta, this guardian aberration is on a killing spree.
A lone wight wandering in search of someone to kill.
A sneaky scout and his wolf pet.
A Dire Wolf and his pack of regular hunters.
A couple of fanatics on their way to a brutal pilgrimage.
A group of fanatic Misaye followers who have their own interpretations of their deity's creed.
A group of dead ogres made into worse versions of their former selves.
A bunch of orcs looking for scars and glory.
A wight and his soldiers on a hunt for the living.
A crazed man and his starving wolf companions.
A band of ghasts looking for souls to reap and bodies to devour.
A ghast and his ghouls looking for souls to reap and bodies to devour.
A goblin shaman and his pet dire wolf.
A heteroclite party of goblins accompanied by a dire wolf and an ogre.
A band of crazed fanatics who believe in swords more than they believe in words.
A pack led by a monstrous winter wolf.
Simply put, a band of wandering zombies in search of living flesh.
Fanatics looking for prey to enslave.
A necromancer and his creations on the warpath.
A band of orcs led by an ogre.
A bunch of fire spiders wandering out of their zone of comfort.
A powerful warlord and his chaplain in search for a glorious battle.
New Empire combatants who decided to take it upon themselves to apply the law of the Old Empire.
Wandering minotaurs looking for freedom and bloodshed.
A group of sneaky individuals with great skills and sharp blades.
A ranger who's spent too much time in the Badlands, and became one more monster.
A band of deadly archers looking to hone their skills on live targets.
A band of crusaders whose faith has been lost after theirs were corrupted by evil magic.
Another party of orc warchiefs trying to become kings of the Badlands.
A powerful wizard and his escort, looking for foes to burn to ashes.
Powerful Fighters looking for anything to kill to become even more experienced.
A powerful cleric with his personal escort, on a murderous mission.
A group of undead giant spiders.
A bunch of huge, nasty, teleporting spiders.
An undead hunter and his undead pet wolf.
Huge flying snakes resembling small dragons.
A couple of young remorhazes… still deadly!
A trio of deadly giant insects looking for their next meal.
A gigantic zealot and two lesser redeemers looking for magic to feed upon.
Small fiery elementals born from some chaotic Badlands magic.
Fiery elementals born from some chaotic Badlands magic.
Very powerful fiery elementals born from some chaotic Badlands magic.
Small air elementals born from some chaotic Badlands magic.
Air elementals born from some chaotic Badlands magic.
This degenerate dragon was born in the Badlands. Now it's looking to kill something.
A group of venomous Badlands creatures.
A group of giant spiders born in the acidic underground lakes of the Badlands.
Small elementals born underground in the chaotic Badlands.
Earth elementals born underground in the chaotic Badlands.
A group of powerful skeletons summoned by an experienced necromancer.
A band of goblin assassins with a hunger for blood.
A large group of experienced goblins on a path for blood.
An orc raiding party led by a powerful orc grimblade.
A couple of orc beastmasters and their pets looking for easy prey.
A band of deadly wandering Badlands wraiths looking for souls to torment.
A powerful necromancer and his summoned creatures, looking for a challenge.
Wandering broods in search of blood.
A terrifying young remorhaz with a bunch of arctic predators scavenging after him.
A small pack of winter wolves on the hunt.
A couple of Winter Wolves on the hunt.
Undead wolves behaving like they're still alive and hunting.
An undead hunter and his pet.
A powerful band of undead warriors.
Small air elementals that like to kill.
Small earth elementals in a bad mood.
A deadly orc assassin and his escort.
A band of goblins who tamed a powerful minotaur.
